title: Stock UI Icon Theme Apex Nova
creator: djskarpia

extendedInfo.description: *** PLEASE READ ***Why & Policy: This icon pack exists simply because most people hate the fact that icons are sized differently and shaped differently... So trying to follow a line using always stock icons as base to draw my icons i have created this pack and my intention is keep it always updated. My hope is that lot of people can agree with this project... The more we are the more pack grows up... If you like my work, my project and my ideas just buy it a the cost of a coffee and keep your launcher cool and updated... Also please share with your circles and on facebook the theme... I prefer one customer sized theme and regularly updated instead of tons of beautiful themes with few icons and abandoned after some weeks...âFeaturesâ:	âª1200+ HD icons (144x144) (Growing with REGULAR UPDATES)        âªIcon Mask for other icons	âª30 Fantastic HD Wallpapers included and 1000+ at the link :(https://plus.google.com/u/0/photos/100106026474390425594/albums)	âªfor Apex Only: Sense 5 font        âªfor Nova: 16 Dock Styles that you can select in settings	âªUnicon (Icon Themer) Support - You Can Set Icons with ALL Launchers!	âªIncluded in icon picker 18 Drawer icons to apply manuallyInstallation:Simple! First of all, be sure youâve installed one compatible launcher, then open the app and click on Apply Theme, select your launcher and complete the action... Et voilÃ ... New life to your style!Recommended Settings: icon size-> 110% , no margins or small & Dock Icons Size - SmallIf you have problems, just watch the video i provided: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPkvm-4jb5Q... Wrong Activities if you notice that in the pack (icon picker) there is the icon, but it isn't correctly applied report me via mail, so i can fix this (dev are frequently changing app name activities)---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------******** How to Submit a request *********Method 11) download https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sika524.android.quickshortcut2) follow this simple tutorial in point n.2 http://czarnomorski.pl/help.php and copy the application activity3) open this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1EAwKiN6Kk0zYxNtB26Hm2nqe9wo1Yak7yFxIoR-_BAY/viewform and submit the request... It will be processed asapMethod 21)Install https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.droidicon.androidactivities&hl=it2)open the app and send to the site the informations on app names3)go to http://activities.droidicon.com and search for the app you want to request icon ... check that the app is correct4)send request by compiling the form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1EAwKiN6Kk0zYxNtB26Hm2nqe9wo1Yak7yFxIoR-_BAY/viewform and submit the request... It will be processed asapNote: Works ONLY with following Launchers: Nova, Apex, Holo, Adw, ActionPRO,GO LauncherFor other launchers except Apex, to have folder icons working you have to set it manually in launcher's settings ... you'll find it as first icon when browsing the icons of packWidgets aren't included in the theme, they are various uccw skins that you can find in storeUnicon is still in development so something may not be themed... just wait unicon updates! :)for every question: djskarpia@gmail.comThanks to: La_CÃ² for wallpapers,The1dynasty template, daniel czarnomorski site activities and template-------------------------------Tags: Icons, icon, icon theme, icon pack, apex, nova, holo, adw, launcher, action, next, prime, custom, customization, wallpaper, wallpapers, picker, theme, hd, icone, pack, tema, icon themer, unicon, go, golauncher,nextTags:#Nova.theme

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: The icons and wallpapers look fantastic and are so crisp and clear. Really nice work. Thank you.
reviews.author: Paul Allaway

reviews.title: Very nice theme
reviews.comment: One of the best in market.
reviews.author: Mave Zai

reviews.title: Great,Nice, beautiful and wallpapers
reviews.comment: It\'s beautiful wallpapers and nice icons,I can\'t suggest it further, that\'s so great!
reviews.author: Aung Myo Myint

reviews.title: Just wonderful
reviews.comment: I love this icon set,a lot of icons and a lot of options.can\'t go wrong when you buy these guys
reviews.author: omar hendi

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: I had an issue with the doc apparently not showing my background but the developer responded to my email instantly and help me fix the problem
reviews.author: Aiden Masters

reviews.title: Good icon and support
reviews.comment: Good icon and good service (icon request). Worth the money. Fast update!
reviews.author: NurSalikeen Saparai

reviews.title: Looks great on my S4
reviews.comment: Easily the best and cleanest icon pack in the play store!  At first I thought all the updates were a little annoying but when I realized hd wallpapers were also being updated I couldn\'t complain.  Use this with Nova launcher and you\'re able to resize your icons for a sleek and even cleaner look.
reviews.author: Los Equis

reviews.title: Great icon pack
reviews.comment: Very nice design, lots of icons covered. Money well spent!!
reviews.author: Doron G Rotem

reviews.title: The coolest hd icon theme
reviews.comment: Icons and wallpapers are all great looking. The developers always update it with new icons
reviews.author: Marlon Manabat

reviews.title: Wow.
reviews.comment: Gorgeous theme. Looks great on my HTC One. The wallpapers included are gorgeous. Only icon missing is for the Jawbone UP app. Would love to see one!
reviews.author: Jesus Baez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Beautiful icons and wallpaper, by far one of the best. By the way what\'s the name of the search bar on one of the pictures?
reviews.author: Omar Lezcano

reviews.title: Great Set
reviews.comment: Really nice looking icons, and some brilliant wallpapers too.
reviews.author: Todd Levy

reviews.comment: These are very nice. I especially enjoy the wallpapers,  they really pop out at you. Great work!
reviews.author: Darren MacWhirter

reviews.title: Amazing Icon set.
reviews.comment: It has an icon for every app that I need and they all look fantastic on my 468PPI HTC One. Good job! Only complaint is I wish it had more wallpapers included with it. Other than that, fantastic.
reviews.author: Osmin Mercado

reviews.title: Very well done!
reviews.comment: The icon set looks fantastic on my device, the attention to detail and the quality of the set is obvious.
reviews.author: Andrew Gallagher
